about_the_game:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Unluckily in Love, including:

  • Three uncensored sex scenes
  • Two new CGs
  • About 8,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Unluckily in Love, to download.

content_descriptors.notes:
This patch adds three gay sex scenes to Unluckily in Love. These scenes depict naked male bodies, though it does not show any genitals. These scenes are all consensual.
Note: the characters involved in these scenes are first cousins, which might make some readers uncomfortable.

Requires the base game, Unluckily in Love, to download.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

name: Unluckily in Love Adult Patch
